tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** ** *** ****** ****** *** ** * ********.She ensured a perfect delivery experience.I respect her alot n always say she is second only to my own mom for me.
Thankyou mam i wish you the moon n the stars always 
Grateful is a small word

Stuti
Munich/New Delhi

tags: None
review:
** ****** ** ** ********* ****** *** a gem of a person. 
She explains everything very properly to her patients and is one of the most ethical doctors I have come across. 
Madam is well versed with all the latest updates in her field and she gives the best guidance to her patients. 
All words are less to explain the warmth and competence Dr Poonam has, and all I can say is that if one wants the most genuine,honest and ethical treatment, then please visit Dr Poonam.

tags: None
review: An Awsome doctor who is always there to take care of you and is more concerned about you then you yourself. Her skillset and knowledge are paramount in the industry. She is an expert in scanning. I visited her during my pregnancy and she has delivered my healthy baby despite being a GD and a high risk pregnancy case.

tags: None
review: Dr Poonam Tara is an amazing Doctor as is always full of energy and positivity whenever you meet her. Whatever time of the day she is always brimming with positivity and energy. We went to her for pregnancy scans and consultation during a complicated situation during the 2nd trimester scans and were in very complicated and scary situation. She ensured that she brought in required additional consultants where needed and went out of her way to get inputs from many other senior doctors for us to help understand the situation and chose a path forward. She is a fabulous person always worried about the patients well-being and progress. An amazing doctor to help during a very complicated phase of our journey. Can’t thank you enough Doc. God bless you.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
Positives first: the doctor gave me information on vaccines for sexual health and pap smears as women in India are at high risk for cervical cancer. She was approachable and friendly, articulate. The office was hygienic and so was the examination. 

The reason I would not recommend her based on my experience, would be that I did not receive any clear information or treatment besides what's already available online on fora on the issue I consulted the doctor for. I also felt body shamed (also had my arm and belly jiggled casually by doctor, which I found disconcerting), and the entire approach was that of, "lose weight, eat less and everything will be alright" ******* ** ********** ****** ** * ******* **** *** ** ******* ***** ****** *** ********* Said approach can be problematic as real problems may be dismissed and never brought to light, especially in a country such as India where fear and taboo exists around consulting gyanecs unless one is pregnant.

tags: None
review: Well-spoken, humble, and sweetest doctor I have met, I couldn't have asked for a better doctor. *** ** ****** *** **** ****** *** has an ample amount of experience. I am very much satisfied with her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Amazing doctor with complete care and concern.Got very positive vibes. She is friendly and genuine.God bless her always

review: The best thing is doctor has devoted complete time to listen to our issues and explained in detail the possible reasons.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Poonam was very friendly and easy to talk to and approach. She made me feel comfortable in her office and was more than willing to explain everything that was happening to me.
